org.apache.twill.api

Interface ResourceReport


  • public interface ResourceReport
    This interface provides a snapshot of the resources an application is using broken down by each runnable.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getApplicationId()
      Get the id of the application master.
      TwillRunResources getAppMasterResources()
      Get the resources application master is using.
      Map<String,Collection<TwillRunResources>> getResources()
      Get all the run resources being used across all runnables.
      Collection<TwillRunResources> getRunnableResources(String runnableName)
      Get all the run resources being used by all instances of the specified runnable.
      List<String> getServices()
      Get the list of services of the application master.

    • Method Detail

      • getRunnableResources

        Collection<TwillRunResources> getRunnableResources(String runnableName)
        Get all the run resources being used by all instances of the specified runnable.
        Parameters:
        runnableName - the runnable name.
        Returns:
        resources being used by all instances of the runnable.

      • getResources

        Map<String,Collection<TwillRunResources>> getResources()
        Get all the run resources being used across all runnables.
        Returns:
        all run resources used by all instances of all runnables.

      • getAppMasterResources

        TwillRunResources getAppMasterResources()
        Get the resources application master is using.
        Returns:
        resources being used by the application master.

      • getApplicationId

        String getApplicationId()
        Get the id of the application master.
        Returns:
        id of the application master.

      • getServices

        List<String> getServices()
        Get the list of services of the application master.
        Returns:
        list of services of the application master.
